about_the_game:
Eden Remains: Arrival is a Sci-fi First Person Action-Survival game. You play an elite dropship trooper sent to investigate a distress signal at a remote research facility on Eden. After being mysteriously shot down on arrival, you must survive a hostile planet to reach the facility and restablish communication.

Planetary Survival

Explore a harsh planetary environment. Gather resources, manage vitals, and craft supplies to stay alive while dealing with a range of hostile creatures.

Intense Combat

Engage in challenging combat that demands awareness and positioning to stay alive. Choose from a selection of customizable weapons to dispense destruction.

Mystery Story

It’s been 50 years since the asteroid destroyed the first homeworld of mankind. The Eden Initiative was the first re-colonization effort sent back to discover what remains.

Suit & Weapon Customization

Fabricate upgrades for suit and weapons such as high capacity magazines, recoil stabilizers, and modules to improve suit functionality.

  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 / AMD FX-6300

  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 / AMD R9 280X
